cnd21:1.1: Idamavoca bhagava magadhesu viharanto pasanake cetiye, paricarakasolasanam brahmananam ajjhittho puttho puttho panham byakasi.
cnd21:2.4: Magadhesu viharantoti magadhanamake janapade viharanto iriyanto vattento palento yapento yapento.
cnd21:2.7: Paricarakasolasanam brahmanananti pingiyo brahmano bavarissa brahmanassa paddho paddhacaro paricarako sisso.
cnd21:2.10: Atha va te solasa brahmana buddhassa bhagavato paddha paddhacara paricaraka sissati—
cnd21:3.3: Puttho putthoti puttho puttho pucchito pucchito yacito yacito ajjhesito ajjhesito pasadito pasadito.
cnd21:3.4: Panham byakasiti panham byakasi acikkhi desesi pannapesi patthapesi vivari vibhaji uttaniakasi pakasesiti—
cnd21:4.1: “Idamavoca bhagava magadhesu viharanto pasanake cetiye, paricarakasolasanam brahmananam ajjhittho puttho puttho panham byakasi”ti.
cnd21:5.1: Ekamekassa cepi panhassa atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammam patipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jaramaranassa param.
cnd21:6.1: Ekamekassa cepi panhassati ekamekassa cepi ajitapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi tissametteyyapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi punnakapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi mettagupanhassa, ekamekassa cepi dhotakapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi upasivapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi nandakapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi hemakapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi todeyyapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi kappapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi jatukannipanhassa, ekamekassa cepi bhadravudhapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi udayapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi posalapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi mogharajapanhassa, ekamekassa cepi pingiyapanhassati—
cnd21:7.1: Atthamannaya dhammamannayati sveva panho dhammo, visajjanam atthoti attham annaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
cnd21:7.3: Dhammamannayati dhammam annaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katvati—
cnd21:7.6: Dhammanudhammam patipajjeyyati sammapatipadam anulomapatipadam apaccanikapatipadam anvatthapatipadam dhammanudhammapatipadam patipajjeyyati—
cnd21:7.8: Gaccheyyeva jaramaranassa paranti jaramaranassa param vuccati amatam nibbanam.
cnd21:7.9: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
cnd21:7.10: Gaccheyyeva jaramaranassa paranti jaramaranassa param gaccheyya, param adhigaccheyya, param adhiphasseyya, param sacchikareyyati—
cnd21:7.13: Param papenti param sampapenti param samanupapenti, jaramaranassa taranaya samvattantiti—
cnd21:8.6: Parayananteva adhivacananti param vuccati amatam nibbanam …pe… nirodho nibbanam.
cnd21:8.9: Adhivacananti sankha samanna pannatti voharo namam namakammam namadheyyam nirutti byanjanam abhilapoti—
cnd21:9.1: “Ekamekassa cepi panhassa atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammam patipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jaramaranassa param.
cnd21:13.3: Buddhoti yo so bhagava sayambhu anacariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu samam saccani abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbannutam patto balesu ca vasibhavam.
cnd21:13.5: Bujjhita saccaniti buddho, bodheta pajayati buddho, sabbannutaya buddho, sabbadassavitaya buddho, abhinneyyataya buddho, visavitaya buddho, khinasavasankhatena buddho, nirupalepasankhatena buddho, ekantavitaragoti buddho, ekantavitadosoti buddho, ekantavitamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekayanamaggam gatoti buddho, eko anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti buddho, abuddhivihatatta buddhipatilabhati buddho.
cnd21:13.6: Buddhoti netam namam matara katam na pitara katam na bhatara katam na bhaginiya katam na mittamaccehi katam na natisalohitehi katam na samanabrahmanehi katam na devatahi katam.
cnd21:13.7: Vimokkhantikametam buddhanam bhagavantanam bodhiya mule saha sabbannutananassa patilabha sacchika pannatti, yadidam buddhoti.
cnd21:13.8: Ete buddham upagacchunti ete buddham upagamimsu upasankamimsu payirupasimsu paripucchimsu paripanhimsuti—
cnd21:14.2: Silasamvaropi caranam, indriyasamvaropi caranam, bhojane mattannutapi caranam, jagariyanuyogopi caranam, sattapi saddhamma caranam, cattaripi jhanani caranam.
cnd21:14.3: Sampannacarananti sampannacaranam setthacaranam visetthacaranam pamokkhacaranam uttamacaranam pavaracaranam.
cnd21:14.4: Isiti isi bhagava mahantam silakkhandham esi gavesi pariyesiti isi …pe… mahesakkhehi va sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito—
cnd21:14.5: “kaham buddho, kaham bhagava, kaham devadevo kaham narasabho”ti—
cnd21:15.3: Nipune panheti gambhire duddase duranubodhe sante panite atakkavacare nipune panditavedaniye panheti—
cnd21:16.2: Buddhoti yo so bhagava …pe… sacchika pannatti, yadidam buddhoti.
cnd21:16.3: Setthanti aggam settham visettham pamokkham uttamam pavaram buddham upagamum upagamimsu upasankamimsu payirupasimsu paripucchimsu paripanhimsuti—
cnd21:19.3: Buddhoti yo so bhagava …pe… sacchika pannatti, yadidam buddhoti.
cnd21:19.4: Pabyakasiti tesam buddho pabyakasi acikkhi desesi pannapesi patthapesi vivari vibhaji uttaniakasi pakasesiti—
cnd21:20.2: Panham putthoti panham puttho pucchito yacito ajjhesito pasadito.
cnd21:20.3: Yathatathanti yatha acikkhitabbam tatha acikkhi, yatha desitabbam tatha desesi, yatha pannapetabbam tatha pannapesi, yatha patthapetabbam tatha patthapesi, yatha vivaritabbam tatha vivari, yatha vibhajitabbam tatha vibhaji, yatha uttanikatabbam tatha uttaniakasi, yatha pakasitabbam tatha pakasesiti—
cnd21:21.1: Panhanam veyyakaranenati panhanam veyyakaranena acikkhanena desanena pannapanena patthapanena vivaranena vibhajanena uttanikammena pakasanenati—
cnd21:22.2: Tosesiti tosesi vitosesi pasadesi aradhesi attamane akasi.
cnd21:22.4: Muniti monam vuccati nanam …pe… sangajalamaticca so muniti—
cnd21:25.3: Tositati tosita vitosita pasadita aradhita attamana katati—
cnd21:25.6: mamsacakkhunapi cakkhuma, dibbacakkhunapi cakkhuma, pannacakkhunapi cakkhuma, buddhacakkhunapi cakkhuma, samantacakkhunapi cakkhuma.
cnd21:26.2: Buddhoti yo so bhagava …pe… sacchika pannatti, yadidam buddhoti.
cnd21:26.4: So gotamo gottena, bhagavapi gotamo gottena, bhagava suriyassa gottanatako gottabandhu.
cnd21:27.1: Brahmacariyamacarimsuti brahmacariyam vuccati asaddhammasamapattiya arati virati pativirati veramani viramanam akiriya akaranam anajjhapatti velaanatikkamo setughato.
cnd21:27.2: Api ca nippariyayavasena brahmacariyam vuccati ariyo atthangiko maggo, seyyathidam—
cnd21:27.3: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi.
cnd21:28.1: Varapannassa santiketi varapannassa aggapannassa setthapannassa visetthapannassa pamokkhapannassa uttamapannassa pavarapannassa.
cnd21:32.4: Yatha buddhena desitanti yatha buddhena acikkhitam desitam pannapitam patthapitam vivaritam vibhajitam uttanikatam pakasitanti—
cnd21:33.1: Tatha yo patipajjeyyati sammapatipadam anulomapatipadam apaccanikapatipadam anvatthapatipadam dhammanudhammapatipadam patipajjeyyati—
cnd21:34.1: Gacche param aparatoti param vuccati amatam nibbanam …pe… nirodho nibbanam;
cnd21:34.2: aparam vuccanti kilesa ca khandha ca abhisankhara ca.
cnd21:34.3: Gacche param aparatoti aparato param gaccheyya, param adhigaccheyya, param phasseyya, param sacchikareyyati—
cnd21:37.1: Apara param gaccheyyati aparam vuccanti kilesa ca khandha ca abhisankhara ca;
cnd21:37.4: Apara param gaccheyyati apara param gaccheyya, param adhigaccheyya, param phasseyya, param sacchikareyyati—
cnd21:38.1: Bhavento maggamuttamanti maggamuttamam vuccati ariyo atthangiko maggo, seyyathidam—
cnd21:38.3: Maggamuttamanti maggam aggam settham visettham pamokkham uttamam pavaram.
cnd21:41.1: Param gamanayati param gamanaya param sampapanaya param samanupapanaya jaramaranassa taranayati—
cnd21:42.3: Param vuccati amatam nibbanam …pe… nirodho nibbanam.
